main event: Several residents of Belfast, Maine observed unidentified flying objects in the sky on June 6, 1958.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately 30 minutes,Photographs were taken of the objects which were forwarded for further analysis,The objects were described as two oval-shaped with reddish-orange glow,No known aircraft were operating in the area at the time,One observer also reported seeing a round to oval-shaped object observed for about 5 minutes.
sighted object: two oval-shaped objects with reddish-orange glow
witness description: Residents of Belfast, including Richard J. Alder and Kenneth A. Delano from the U.S. Air Force.
